item.description: Associations Sequelize supports the standard associations: One-To-One, One-To-Many and Many-To-Many. To do this, Sequelize provides four types of associations that should be combined to create them: The HasOne association The BelongsTo association The HasMany association The BelongsToMany association The guide will start explaining how to define these four types of associations, and then will follow up to explain how to combine those to define the three standard association types (One-To-One, One-To-Many and Many-To-Many).
